page.title: 02Employment in the Villages
page.content: Most of the people who live in these villages work in other towns and cities and have to travel to work.{Transport} is difficult because the roads are all grade 3 and are not salted in winter. There are always problems in winter.In Hartwell there are jobs in the school, engineering,sales in the shop and whare -houses,lorry driving,farming and forestry,so it is quite well off.The wood yard has just reopened and this has given more {employment} again.There is no link to the M1 officially so that there is a further difficulty about working away from the village.So far the housing has not got too expensive & young families are still able to use Hartwell as a dormitory base.Being close to development areas like Milton Keynes and Northampton firms do not want to come here. Jonathan Tibble,11.
